short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AdBlock Shield - blocks all annoying ads, tracking and malware.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Now there is a very popular AdBlock Shield application, which is used by a lot of users.  AdBlock Shield will help you get rid of annoying ads so that they do not interfere with your browsing.  If you like to watch videos of your favorite bloggers, then we are sure that if you download AdBlock Shield, you will not regret it a bit.  It is very convenient and comfortable, because no one will interrupt your viewing at the most interesting place.  We tried to make our extension as simple and comfortable as possible for your use.  Therefore, all you need to do is just install AdBlock Shield on your device, or you can do it using the link below.
